metadata.title: CVE-2024-8124 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 16.4 prior to 17.1.7, starting from 17.2 prior to 17.2.5, startingfrom 17.3 prior to 17.3.2  which could cause Denial of Service via sendinga specific POST request.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
